language_changed: The language was changed to 🇺🇸 English!
unexpected_error: Excuse me! Something went wrong. Please try again later.
welcome_message: Welcome to the Dive Logger! I will be your buddy on 🏝 shore! I'm here to assist you with all things scuba diving, freediving, and equipment management. Whether you're a diving enthusiast, a beginner, or just curious, I've got you covered. Here are some things you can do with me: 🌊 Log your dive experiences and keep track of your underwater adventures. 📷 Share dive photos and memories with the community. 🤖 Get equipment recommendations and maintenance tips. 🗺️ Find exciting dive sites and plan your next underwater journey.
language_already_chosen: The language was already set to 🇺🇸 English!
fill_profile_message: 💫 Great choice! Let's fill your profile first. This will allow you to log your dives and get a chance to engage with other divers in the community. How do you want other divers to call you?
